short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A friendly reminder to blink your eyes every 15 minutes to protect your vision

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension reminds you every 15 minutes to take a break from the computer screen and exercise your eyes to protect your vision. Once downloaded, simply click "Blink!" from the popup and the alarm will be initiated. Extremely helpful if you ever experienced eye strain from staring at a computer screen for a long time.
